articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark 50th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark 50th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here on Wednesday to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there was Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also present were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Hwang Pyong So and other senior officials of the party, state and army, chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and officials of the organs and industrial establishments, labor innovators and other people here.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of his work at the Party Central Committee marks an important occasion in eternally glorifying his feats performed in the party building and a great auspicious event demonstrating the eternality of the harmonious whole of him and the Korean people and a bright prospect of the WPK, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 He was the peerless elder statesman and distinguished leader who created the longest and glorious history of the leadership over the socialist ruling party in the modern history.
					
					 From the very day he began leading the party work, he made sure that the party regarded it as the basic principle of the party building to establish the ideological system of the leader and his leadership system throughout the party, thus firmly ensuring the purity of the party ranks and their unity in thought and purpose based on the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In the whole period of steering the revolution he made the WPK thoroughly apply the leadership principle and method of Juche and consistently adhere to the revolutionary and militant mode of work.
					
					 He led the party building, party activities, revolution and construction in a far-sighted manner, always foreseeing the future of revolution.
					
					 Outstanding statesman and Songun brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, he worked heart and soul to provide a powerful political and military guarantee for the victory of the revolution in the whole period of his leadership over the party.
					
					 He led the WPK to take Songun as its lifeline and that of the revolution and firmly orient the party work to implementing the Songun revolutionary line, thus consolidating the defense capability of the country as firm as a rock.
					
					 He perfectly settled the issue of succession to the leadership decisive of the future destiny of the revolution, thereby providing a basic guarantee for strengthening the party and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, and opening a bright future of the country and the nation.
					
					 His idea and exploits performed in the party building are now being successfully carried forward and developed by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called for doing the party building and activities according to the idea and intention of Kim Jong Il and most thoroughly and perfectly implement his behests, taking hold on great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the guiding idea of the party.
					
					 We will resolutely shatter the vicious moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad for confrontation and certainly achieve the historic cause of national reunification with the concerted efforts of the whole nation under the unfurled banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, he said, concluding:
					
					 The DPRK will expand external relations of the country, defend peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and positively contribute to accomplishing the human cause of independence in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Ministry of Foreign Trade Reorganized as Ministry of External Economic Affairs
articles.content:
Ministry of Foreign Trade Reorganized as Ministry of External Economic Affairs
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK decided to reorganize the Ministry of Foreign Trade as the Ministry of External Economic Affairs of the DPRK by merging the Joint Venture and Investment Commission of the DPRK and the State Economic Development Committee of the DPRK with it.
					 The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly promulgated a decree in this regard on Wednesday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Political Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from MP Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on June 11.
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez said in the message that he paid highest tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on behalf of all party members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on his own behalf on the occasion of 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK which falls on June 19.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the great exploits of Kim Jong Il who devoted all his life to defending peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and the rest of East Asia and victoriously advanced the socialist cause of the world while energetically leading the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in Mt. Paektu would always be remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 It most sincerely wished Kim Jong Un great success in his noble work to wisely lead the WPK and the Korean people's struggle for the victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche and the socialist cause of the world.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift from the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in their joint name.
					 The gift was handed over to an official of the DPRK mission in Switzerland on June 14 by Martin Lotscher, chairman of the committee and chief of the group.

articles.title: Delegation of Korea Federation for Care of Aged Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Korea Federation for Care of Aged Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korea Federation for Care of the Aged led by Vice-Chairwoman Ri Chol Hui on Wednesday returned home after taking part in the 12th Global Conference of the International Federation on Aging held in India.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Political Parties of Russia
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Political Parties of Russia
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A floral basket in the joint name of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and a floral basket of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia were sent to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Wednesday.

articles.title: Korean in Russia Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Korean in Russia Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, Korean in Russia, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 She laid a bouquet before the statues before paying tribute.

articles.title: Lao Diplomats Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
articles.content:
Lao Diplomats Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith and staff members of his embassy visited the International Friendship Exhibition House on Wednesday on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Laos.
					 They paid tribute to the wax replicas of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 They went round gifts presented by party, state and government leaders and prominent figures of many countries.
					
					 At the end of the visit the ambassador wrote in the visitor's book:
					
					 "I am pleased to visit the exhibition house on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries. 
					
					 Our visit to the exhibition house offered an opportunity to know better about the history of the bilateral friendly relations provided by President Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Il Sung rendered unsparing support and encouragement to the Lao people in their struggle for national liberation.
					
					 It is my hope that Korea will be reunified peacefully."

articles.title: Day of Koreans with Disabilities Observed
articles.content:
Day of Koreans with Disabilities Observed
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- There took place a joint meeting at the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Wednesday on the occasion the 2014 Day of Koreans with Disabilities.
					 Present there were Kim Mun Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, officials concerned, persons with disabilities and their families, teachers and pupils of the palace, staff members of the European Union Programme Support, embassies and missions for cooperation of European countries here and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 A joint performance was given by members of the art groups of the disabled and the art groups of the palace.
					
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Pyongyang Is Best", mixed quartet "General's Love" and other numbers.
					
					 At the end of the performance the participants enjoyed sports and amusement games.

articles.title: National Day of Persons with Disabilities Marked
articles.content:
National Day of Persons with Disabilities Marked
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- It has been 11 years since the adoption of the law on protection of the disabled (June 18, 2003) in the DPRK.
					 The law makes it clear that the state is obliged to respect the individualities of persons with disabilities and ensure to them the same socio-political rights and benefits as those for persons without disabilities.
					
					 On this occasion, a joint meeting took place at the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace to celebrate the 2014 National Day of Persons with Disabilities.
					
					 At the meeting, a joint performance was given by members of the art groups of the disabled and art groups of the palace and diverse sportive events were held by the participants in the meeting.
					
					 The performance and events clearly showed the happy life of the disabled under the protection and care of the state and society.  
					
					Jon Kum Hyok, a student of Taedong Blind School in South Phyongan Province, told KCNA:
					
					 I was learning singing but started piano from 40 days ago at the request of my parents. It is my determination to give pleasure to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un with my songs and piano performance.
					
					 Yun Pyong Hui, piano instructor of Jon, said:
					
					 Jon was good in basic musical knowledge and has a good sense. I will teach him to be a good pianist.
					
					 Carla Vitantonio, deputy director for unit 7 of EUPS (European Union Program Support) working for people with disabilities in the DPRK, said:
					
					 Today we are particularly happy to be here together with European and Korean colleagues to celebrate the National Day of Persons with Disabilities in Korea. This inclusive sportive event today that has been organized by the KFPD together with the government and with our support is an added value for people with and without disability.
					
					 Meanwhile, mass rhythmic exercises and amusement games took place in all schools for the disabled, including the Songchon Deaf and Dumb School in Phyongan Province.

articles.title: 17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Held in DPRK
articles.content:
17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The 17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize took place in the DPRK from June 9 to June 18.
					 It was held divided into Taekwon-Do and paduk (go) events.
					
					 In this regard, Paek Chol, secretary of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, and Ri Pong Il, deputy secretary of the Korean Paduk Association, gave following answers to questions put by KCNA:
					
					Q: What is different between the current championship and the previous ones?
					
					A (Paek): First of all, some rules were modified for blitz fighting. For example, the court's size was cut down to seven meters in the length and width, thus making players fully display their ability. And the referee can give a warning to passive players.
					
					Q: How many classifications and events did it have?
					
					 A: It was held divided into two classifications, youth (15-16 years old) and children (13-14 years old). The events included pattern competition, sparring match, self-defence art and exhibition for special skills. Each event had team and individual competitions. The sparring was held divided into team sparring and individual one of seven categories.
					
					Q; Can you tell me about the successes of the championship?
					
					A: The championship has witnessed that players from Pyongyang City and Kangwon, South Hwanghae and Jagang provinces proved successful. Especially, players of Kangwon Province demonstrated high skills in pattern competition.
					
					Q: Will you tell me about the go competition?
					
					A (Ri): The go competition started from Juche 94 (2005), as part of the national Taekwon-Do championship for Jongilbong Prize. The present competition drew preschoolers and children from primary schools and junior secondary schools.
					
					Q: What's the result?
					
					A: Ju Ye Rim at eight from Ryuldong Primary School in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province, took the first place in the individual competition of the third classification and Ri Se Ryon at five from Ryanggang Province, the youngest one belonging to the fourth classification, fully showed her talent to be admired by spectators.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup Closes
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup Closes
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The 17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup closed with due ceremony at the Taekwon-do Hall on Wednesday.
					 The Pyongyang City Taekwon-do team came first in the total points.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, Taekwon-do players and coaches, school youth and children.
					
					 Units and players who proved successful at the championship were awarded trophy cups, diplomas and medals.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-do Committee, made a closing address.

articles.title: Exhibition of Works on Juche Idea Draws Large Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
Exhibition of Works on Juche Idea Draws Large Crowd of Visitors 
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people are visiting the Exhibition of Works on the Juche Idea on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Entering this year, service personnel, people from all walks of life, youth and students, foreigners and overseas Koreans, two times more than those last one year, visited the exhibition.
					
					 Works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il dealing with different fields are displayed there in a chronological order.
					
					 Also on display are visual aid materials on the formation of Juche idea study organizations and their activities and works translated and published in many countries.
					
					 The visitors cherish in their hearts the personalities of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu who performed immortal ideological and theoretical feats in the struggle for hewing out the destiny of the people and accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The visitors are deeply impressed to see photos of Kim Jong Il documenting his feats performed in enriching the ideological and theoretical treasure house of the Korean revolution and mankind and his gem-like propositions and manuscripts of his works.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK brought out an individual stamp to mark the 120th anniversary of founding of the International Olympic Committee (IOC) and others (a sheet and three individuals) on the theme of FIFA World Cup Brazil 2014. 
					 Written on the individual are letters "120 Anniv. of Founding of the International Olympic Committee" in its upper part. It also carries a photo of the founder of the Olympic Games, the Olympic Flag and an Olympic torch relay racer.
					
					 Seen in the upper part of the stamps on the theme of the FIFA World Cup Brazil 2014 are letters "FIFA World Cup Brazil 2014" in English and Korean.
					
					 A stamp with a picture of kicking football player was centered in the sheet carrying a football and the World Cup.
					
					 Other individual stamps pictures footballers dribbling and sliding.

articles.title: Odes to WPK Popular among Koreans
articles.content:
Odes to WPK Popular among Koreans
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A lot of odes to the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) have been created over the past half a century  since "O Mother Party", the  first monumental hymn which sings of the WPK as a mother, was produced in the DPRK in Juche 53 (1964).
					 The last century witnessed the production of dozens of songs dedicated to the party such as "Care of the Mother Party," "The Party Means the Mother and I Am Her Son" and "O Mother Party Which Protected My Destiny."
					
					 The party warmly embraced the people under its red flag and opened a rosy future of prosperity, meeting all challenges of history with arms of Songun despite unprecedentedly arduous trials. These great exploits of the party are reflected in the odes to General Kim Jong Il, the sun of Songun, and songs of the victory of Songun which reverberated far and wide across the country.
					
					 Songs of thanks and songs of pledge dedicated to the WPK were successfully created in the year which marked its 65th founding anniversary and witnessed the 3rd Conference of the WPK.
					
					 Song "Party Means the Care of the General," in particular, reached the cream of hymns to the party as it raised to the highest level all ideological sentiments represented in the hymns created in the past period.
					
					 "Glory to Our Great Party" and other songs helped the stirring era in which great changes took place in carrying out the party's revolutionary cause seethe with excitement and joy.
					
					 Song "Fly High Our Party Flag" created in the 1980s marking the 67th founding anniversary of the WPK was successfully re-represented to resound forth.
					
					 Song "Party's Flag, Always with You", hymn to the party, was created last year and song "Voice from My Heart", the most famous music, was produced this year.

articles.title: Injection for Treating Thrombus Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Injection for Treating Thrombus Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- An intravenous injection for treatment of thrombus was developed in the DPRK. Its main composition is extracts of Cnidium officinale rootstalk. 
					 It helps rapidly dissolve blood clots formed in situ within the vascular system of the body and has no side effect. 
					
					 It is effective for treating acute cerebral thrombosis as well as its sequelae like lalopathy, facioplegia and hemiplegia.
					
					 The injection won a patent for its therapeutic value.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Park Geun Hye Group's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Park Geun Hye Group's Anti-DPRK Remarks
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, Park Geun Hye talked nonsense before advisory members at Chongwadae that "the danger of the north's nuclear development and provocations is ever more increasing and that she would lead the north to changes on the solid basis of security." That day a confidant of Park blustered before media persons that it is necessary to "hamstring the north's efforts to bolster up its nuclear capability," claiming that the north is going ahead with provocations including projected nuclear test and missile launch." 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but the last-ditch effort of the Park group to justify its despicable acts of treachery for zealously joining in its U.S. master's scenario for igniting a war of aggression on the Korean peninsula at any cost and tide over its worsening ruling crisis. What is more ridiculous is that the puppet group is crying out for "total denuclearization of the north" and "the settlement of the nuclear issue of the north on a priority basis" under the pretext of "the north's moves to bolster up its nuclear capability" by distorting the essence of the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 What the Korean nation hopes is the denuclearization of the whole peninsula, not unilateral "denuclearization of the north" because the U.S. was chiefly to blame for spawning the nuclear issue on the peninsula and pushing the DPRK to its access to nuclear weapons. 
					
					 The Park group is set to justify its moves to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and put more spurs to the preparations for a war against the north under the pretexts of "settlement of the nuclear issue of the north on a priority basis" and "total denuclearization of the north". 
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence to foil the moves of the U.S. and the Park group for a nuclear war against it and wipe out the enemies at a single strike once they dare attack it. 
					
					 The Park group would be well advised to bear this in mind and stop its reckless remarks.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Park Geun Hye's "Personnel Reshuffle"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Park Geun Hye's "Personnel Reshuffle"
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye is now carrying out "personnel reshuffle" for her "government shake-up" but it is now being censured by the public for causing the worst human rights disaster.
					 Park is reviving all fascist ruling mechanisms including the puppet government, National Assembly and military and consolidating the fascist dictatorial ruling system with ultra-right confrontation elements.
					
					 For example, she appointed Kim Kwan Jin, a boss of military hooligans who has been cursed and denounced by all people, as the chief of the security office of Chongwadae in charge of diplomatic and security issues.
					
					 Traitor Kim has worked with blood-shot eyes to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. His appointment to the above-said post is little short of an open declaration of all-out confrontation with the DPRK and a war provocation against it.
					
					 Han Min Gu who was informally designated as the puppet minister of Defense is also a diehard bellicose element who inherited the blood of a pro-Japanese lackey. During his office as the chairman of the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff he incited confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, calling "the north's nuclear weapons and other WMDs the biggest factor of instability in the region."
					
					 Yun Tu Hyon, publicity chief, Ri Pyong Gi, a candidate for the director of the Intelligence Service and others are ultra-right conservative elements, an indication that there is nothing new in the "personnel reshuffle" at Chongwadae.
					
					 Park's designation of the former chief editor of Choongang Ilbo Mun Chang Guk as a candidate for the "prime minister" is throwing the south Korean political landscape into an inescapable abyss of ruin.
					
					 Mun Chang Guk described the DPRK as a "group of evil men and terrorists" and cried out for making a switchover in the unification policy to leading the "north to a collapse". This diehard confrontation element went the lengths of asserting as regards the "north's nuclear issue that "there is no option but to introduce the U.S. tactical nukes  or to maintain equilibrium by its independent mode."
					
					 66 percent of the south Koreans are demanding him give up his candidacy, holding accountable for what he uttered in the past. Even lawmakers from the ruling and opposition parties are openly calling for the withdrawal of designation of him as a candidate, an indication of uncontrollable furor. This is attributable to what he has done against the compatriots.
					
					 There are public voices that "Park who is not fit for president is choosing such guy as prime minister."
					
					 Park's "government reshuffle" is a hideous politically-motivated action against the trend of the times, a clear indication that her true colors as a fascist, dictator and confrontation maniac can never change.
					
					 In a nutshell, this is a revelation of her intention to persist in sycophancy and treachery, fascist dictatorship, scandals and moves to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 She is running the whole gamut of despicable political hooliganism in a bid to tide over the worsening ruling crisis and stay in power but the conservative group is fated to meet a political ruin.

articles.title: Withdrawal of Designation of Candidate for "PM" Demanded by S. Koreans
articles.content:
Withdrawal of Designation of Candidate for "PM" Demanded by S. Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- People of various circles are becoming increasingly critical of a conservative element whom the Park Geun Hye group designated as a candidate for the puppet prime minister.
					 Jong Yon Thae, professor at Catholic University, Ju Jin O, professor at Sangmyung University, Jo Sung Rae, professor at Chongju University, Ri Man Ryol, honorary professor at Sookmyung Women's University, and others demanded Mun Chang Guk who was designated as a candidate for the "prime minister" make an apology to the nation and give up candidacy, saying his outlook on history is absolutely intolerable.
					
					 Hanguk Ilbo in an editorial on June 12 noted that not only the opposition parties but the ruling party demands the withdrawal of the designation and his voluntary resignation, an indication of the gravity of the issue.
					
					 An editorial posted on Voice of People, an internet paper, on June 13 said that if Mun refuses to give up his candidacy of his own accord, Park Geun Hye has no option but to withdraw her designation and this is the only way of escaping catastrophe.
					
					 The Justice and Peace Commission of the Council of Christian Churches in a statement on June 12 charged that more ridiculous than Mun's remarks is the Park regime which designated the guy who is not qualified.

articles.title: Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Demanded by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Demanded by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches Monday issued a commentary urging the puppet authorities to implement the June 15 joint declaration, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The commentary said that the joint declaration is a historic agreement which the top leaders of the south and the north signed and paved the way of reconciliation and reunification for the first time in the history of Korean division.
					
					 It demanded the south Korean authorities restore the spirit of the joint declaration, immediately opt for unconditional dialogue and resume the south-north exchange and cooperation.

articles.title: Ferry Sewol Disaster Is Highly Likely to Be Farce Staged by Regime: S. Korean Internet Paper
articles.content:
Ferry Sewol Disaster Is Highly Likely to Be Farce Staged by Regime: S. Korean Internet Paper
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- An article terming the ferry Sewol sinking accident a crafty farce of the regime which led to a hideous massacre was posted on the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo on June 15.
					 There is an assertion that the ferry Sewol disaster was highly likely to be a farce staged by the regime to tide over the crisis caused by its election-rigging, the article noted, adding many people agree with this view.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime worked out  a plan for staging the farce for rescuing all the passengers aboard the ferry but it unexpectedly sank too easily to do so, claiming huge casualties.
					
					 The accident occurred at a time when it was fully disclosed that all power organs were mobilized for the election rigging during the last "presidential" election.
					
					 As the Park regime emerged as a result of this rigging, it was highly probable that it could easily orchestrate such an accident.
					
					 All information published by the regime was not true in actuality but it is clear that all the circumstances turn out to be true, if the assertion is viewed according to the contention that the accident was a farce staged by the regime itself from its very beginning.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Actions to Appoint Sycophantic and Conservative Forces to Important Posts Slammed
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Actions to Appoint Sycophantic and Conservative Forces to Important Posts Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Seven history study organizations including the History Study Society, Ancient History Study Society, Modern History Study Society and the Society for the Study of the National Movement on June 16 issued a joint statement in protest against the puppet authorities for attempting to appoint sycophantic and conservative forces to important government posts.
					 The statement said the sycophantic remarks made by Mun Chang Guk, who was designated as a candidate for the "prime minister", gave a very great shock to the public.
					
					 It noted his assertion that the August 15 liberation was presented by "God" was an act of distorting the history of the liberation struggle.
					
					 In the light of his other outpourings, his outlook on history is more narrow-minded and dangerous than the neo-conservative elements' outlook on history, it added.
					
					 The statement accused Kim Myong Su, who was informally designated as minister of Education, of supporting the misrepresented textbooks justifying pro-Japanese acts and dictatorship.
					
					 It urged the authorities to withdraw at once the action to appoint those going against the people's will.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in U.S
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held events in different parts of the U.S. on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Koreans in the U.S. held a ceremony marking the 14th anniversary of the joint declaration in Los Angeles on June 14.
					
					 At the ceremony speakers called upon all fellow countrymen to do their best to implement the joint declaration, bearing in mind that it is the landmark indicating the target, principle and way of reunification.
					
					 Then followed a lecture under the title of "Now is the time to make a breakthrough in south-north relations."
					
					 The lecturer said that committees for implementing the joint declaration were formed in the north, the south and overseas. June 15 organizations were formed in the central and western parts of the U.S., Washington and New York to hold events on the occasion of the declaration every year and demonstrate the will for reunification, he said, and went on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea brought to naught the achievements made in the June 15 era and incited confrontation with fellow countrymen and the Park Geun Hye regime also resorted heinous confrontation policy and blocked the improvement of the south-north relations. Koreans in the U.S., experienced the past military fascist regime which intensified the "yusin" rule after the publication of the July 4 North-South Joint Statement, are sharply following the movement of the present regime of south Korea.
					
					 Koreans in New York held an event on June 15 at which they demonstrated the will for reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in pamphlet by the Alina-ve Publishing House in Vladivostok of Russia on June 5.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life of loving the country and people.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A meeting was held in Norway, seminar in Peru and lecture in Guinea between May 30 and June 10.
					
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue of the meeting was a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the events were officials and other people of those countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said that Kim Jong Il devoted himself to developing the WPK into an invincible party. He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The WPK has advanced along the road of victory under the banner of the Juche idea and become a strong revolutionary party to which the world looks up.
					
					 The exploits he performed in the party building will be everlasting.
					
					 The general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent leader who developed the WPK into an invincible militant ranks struggling for socialism, independence against imperialism and for progress and prosperity and an example to be learned by the world progressive political parties.
					
					 A congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in Norway.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers devoted special write-ups to the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Russian paper Rio Panorama on June 4 and 11 edited articles accompanied with photos of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In an article titled "Eternal general secretary" it said that he led the party and revolution to the road of victory with his rare political ability which no one can match.
					
					 The 4th Conference of the WPK in April, 2012 decided to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK and eternally glorify his revolutionary career and immortal exploits, the article noted.
					
					 The paper carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, great master of the independent politics".
					
					 The article said that he, who led the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence to victory, would be recorded forever in the history of world politics as the great master of the independent politics.
					
					 The June 6th issue of the Nepalese paper Arpan carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, his immortal feats in party leadership". The article noted that he developed the WPK into a party which forms a harmonious whole with the popular masses, takes care of their destiny in a responsible manner and faithfully serves them and a strong political force successfully guiding the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The June 1st issue of the Bangladeshi paper Industry in an article titled "DPRK's single-minded unity and Kim Jong Il" said that he made all the people get firmly united as one by pursuing his benevolent politics and all-embracing politics.
					
					 It noted that the DPRK could not only defend socialism against the imperialist allied forces including the U.S. but also usher in a fresh turn in building a thriving nation because it has the strongest weapons like the single-minded unity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Austrian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria released a bulletin on June 12 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The bulletin carried an article titled "Start of work at the Central Committee of WPK" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He developed the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche type guided by the idea of President Kim Il Sung and a vanguard rank resolutely defending and glorifying his idea and exploits, the article said, and went on:
					
					 At the end of the last century when the Korean revolution faced the severest ordeals, all the service personnel and people of the DPRK keenly realized what a great fortune they had by holding Kim Jong Il at the head of the WPK in high esteem.
					
					 It is the greatest honor and happiness of the Korean people to have Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and intention of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un clearly indicated the way to develop the WPK into the eternally glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the ever-victorious history of the WPK will be given a steady continuity with the immortal Juche idea.

articles.title: Austrian Body Urges S. Korea Not to Be Stooge of U.S. Imperialism
articles.content:
Austrian Body Urges S. Korea Not to Be Stooge of U.S. Imperialism
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- We demand the south Korean authorities do not act as a stooge of U.S. imperialism. 
					 The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria said this in a statement on June 12 to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					
					 Noting that constant provocations and war exercises for aggression against the DPRK should be stopped at once, the statement went on:
					
					 HE Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, put forward many proposals for national reunification and leader Kim Jong Il devoted himself to the reunification of Korea. 
					
					 To mend the north-south relations and implement the joint declaration is in line with the interests of the whole Korean nation. 
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities do not take part in the war exercises for aggression against the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to set free all the patriots and immediately lift the fascist "Security Law". 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should ensure the independent rights of the people and respect the activities of trade unions.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked in Kyrgyzstan
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held a meeting at the Korean Center in Bishkek on June 15, the 14th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Displayed there were photos documenting immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in carrying out the cause of national reunification and photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un providing field guidance to units of the Korean People's Army and various fields of the national economy.   Photos showing the development of the homeland were also displayed there.
					
					 It was attended by Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, and its officials and Koreans in Kyrgyzstan.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Pak in his speech said that a rosy future of the nation lies in respecting and implementing the historic north-south joint declarations and this is the only way to tide over the present acute difficulties.
					
					 He called upon overseas Koreans to make positive contributions to restoring the June 15 era of reunification under the uplifted banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Then, the participants looked round the photos on display.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia on June 14 held a meeting in Moscow to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Present there were members of the confederation and compatriots in Russia.
					
					  Kim Chil Song, chairman of the confederation, in a speech said that 14 years have passed since the north-south summit was held, adding that in this period all compatriots keenly realized what a just and practical programme for reunification the June 15 joint declaration was. 
					
					  Vice-Chairperson of the confederation An Hyang Jin noted that the inter-Korean relations are now at the worst phase owing to the south Korean authorities' policy opposed to reunification and dependence on outside forces.
					
					 An called upon the Koreans overseas to take an active part in the movement for the national reconciliation and reunification under the prevailing situation.
					
					 Koreans significantly celebrated the anniversary, singing and dancing to the tune of songs for reunification.

articles.title: Acto central por 50o aniversario de inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en CC de PTC
articles.content:
Acto central por 50o aniversario de inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en CC de PTC
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en esta capital el acto central por el 50o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Asistio el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios, ameritados laborales y trabajadores de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas de la capital.
					
					Fueron invitados ahi los representantes diplomaticos y de las organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en la RPDC.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					El dijo que el 50o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente en el Comite Central del PTC es el importante motivo para glorificar generacion tras generacion sus proezas en la construccion del partido y es gran jubilo para poner de pleno manifiesto la eternidad de la unidad monolitica entre el Dirigente y el pueblo coreano y la radiante perspectiva del PTC.
					
					El Dirigente fue el extraordinario veterano politico y destacado dirigente quien creo la historia mas larga y gloriosa de la direccion del partido en el poder socialista, afirmo y continuo: 
					
					Desde primeros momentos de su direccion sobre el PTC, el Dirigente hizo mantener como principio fundamental de la construccion del partido el establecimiento del sistema de ideologia y direccion del lider en todo el partido y aseguro con firmeza la pureza y la unidad ideo-volitiva de las filas del partido segun la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Durante todo el proceso de su direccion sobre la revolucion, hizo al PTC mantener siempre el modo de trabajo revolucionario y combativo materializando los autoctonos principios y metodos de orientacion. 
					
					Previendo siempre el futuro de la revolucion, condujo con vistas al futuro la construccion y las actividades del partido, la revolucion y la construccion. 
					
					Kim Jong Il, destacado politico y General Insigne del Paektu, hizo grandes esfuerzos por preparar la fuerte garantia politica y militar para la victoria de la revolucion. 
					
					Tomando el Songun como linea de vida del partido y la revolucion, hizo enfocar las labores del partido a la materializacion de la linea revolucionaria del Songun y consolido por todos los medios la capacidad de defensa nacional. 
					
					Al resolver satisfactoriamente el problema de sucesion de la revolucion, que determina el destino de la revolucion, preparo la garantia fundamental para el desarrollo del partido y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y abrio la buena perspectiva de la patria y la nacion. 
					
					Hoy dia, la idea y las proezas del Dirigente en materia de la construccion del partido se llevan adelante por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Es preciso desarrollar segun la idea y el proposito del Dirigente la construccion y las actividades del partido tomando por la idea directriz del partido el gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y materializar mas perfectamente el legado del Dirigente. 
					
					Se debe frustrar tajantemente la brutal campana conflictiva de las fuerzas internas y externas anti-reunificacion y lograr sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion sosteniendo la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					Bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ampliara y desarrollara las relaciones exteriores del pais, defendera la paz del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo y hara gran aporte a la verificacion de la independencia de la humanidad.

articles.title: Publicado decreto de cambiar nombre del Ministerio de Comercio Exterior
articles.content:
Publicado decreto de cambiar nombre del Ministerio de Comercio Exterior
						
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto publicado el dia 18 por el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Ministerio de Comercio Exterior de la RPDC se cambiara por el Ministerio de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero incorporando el Comite de Produccion e Inversion Mixtas y el Comite Estatal de Desarrollo de Economia.

articles.title: Celebran en Corea el Dia Nacional de Discapacitados 2014
articles.content:
Celebran en Corea el Dia Nacional de Discapacitados 2014
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Hoy es el Dia Nacional de Discapacitados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Igualmente, se cumple el 11o aniversario de la aprobacion de la Ley de Proteccion de Discapacitados de la RPDC.
					
					La ley establece que el Estado debe respetar las personalidades de los discapacitados y ofrecerles los mismos derechos e intereses socio-politicos que tienen ciudadanos sanos.
					
					Este dia, en el gimnasio del Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Pyongyang tuvo lugar la celebracion conjunta del Dia Nacional de Discapacitados 2014.
					
					En la ocasion, los integrantes del grupo artistico de discapacitados y del palacio infantil ofrecieron una funcion conjunta y se divirtieron con los juegos deportivos y de recreo.
					
					Asi demostraron el aspecto feliz de la poblacion invalida que bajo la proteccion y atencion especiales del Estado y la sociedad, tiene la libertad y los derechos politicos.
					
					Citado por la ACNC, Jon Kum Hyok (18 anos de edad), alumno de la Escuela de Ciegos de Taedong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, dijo como sigue:
					
					Pasaron mas de 40 dias desde cuando yo comence a aprender el piano siguiendo el consejo de mis padres.
					
					Al principio, mi vocacion era el canto. 
					
					En el futuro, practicare mucho el canto y el piano para dar alegria al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					La maestra guia del referido palacio infantil Yun Pyong Hi dijo:
					
					Jon tiene buen conocimiento basico de la musica y es muy sensible.
					
					Voy a hacer todo lo posible por formarlo como pianista excelente.
					
					La coordinadora del grupo F de la representacion de cooperacion de la Union Europea acreditada en Corea, Carla Vitantonio, expreso que le complace celebrar el dia de discapacitados junto con esta gente y los representantes de varios paises como miembro de la organizacion de cooperacion de la Union Europea.
					
					Agrego que ha sido testigo de muchos exitos logrados en la proteccion de discapacitados gracias a los esfuerzos del gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					Destaco que percibio la importancia del ambiente global participando en las actividades artisticas y deportivas de los discapacitados y los sanos bajo la atencion profunda del gobierno.
					
					El mismo dia, en todas las escuelas para los discapacitados, inclusive la Escuela de Sordomudos de Songchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, tuvieron lugar la gimnasia ritmica masiva y los juegos de recreo.

articles.title: Clausurado XVII Campeonato Nacional de Taekwondo por la Copa Jongilbong
articles.content:
Clausurado XVII Campeonato Nacional de Taekwondo por la Copa Jongilbong
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el XVII Campeonato Nacional de Taekwondo por la Copa Jongilbong. 
					El equipo de Taekwondo de la ciudad de Pyongyang ocupo el primer lugar en la clasificacion general del evento. 
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en el Palacio de Taekwondo la ceremonia de clausura con la participacion del secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, los funcionarios correspondientes, los taekwondocas, los entrenadores y los jovenes y escolares. 
					
					Fueron otorgados las copas, diplomas y las medallas a la entidad y los jugadores sobresalientes.
					
					El presidente del Comite Coreano de Taekwondo, Kim Kyong Ho, pronuncio la palabra de clausura.
